author: wsjcom
title: The Cohen Raid and Attorney-Client Privilege
text:
Regarding your editorial “The Michael Cohen Raid” (April 11): One cannot imagine a better example of a violation of an attorney-client relationship with the perpetrators best described as members of the “deep state.”
This was nothing less than a precedent-setting event that must be addressed and condemned to restore our faith in the FBI and the legal community.
...
